title: [CLIENT]
body: The game is stuck on authenticating when I try to log in.

replies.body:
Hey all! 
Sorry for not saying something earlier, but we were checking this out and believe we have a fix in place. You should be able to login  without issues. 
How's it looking now?

> [{quoted}](name=RiotRival,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=FARHwWMK,comment-id=000e,timestamp=2017-05-11T07:19:18.957+0000)
>
> Hey all! 
> Sorry for not saying something earlier, but we were checking this out and believe we have a fix in place. You should be able to login  without issues. 
> How's it looking now?

I just reinstalled the game because of this and now i can't play at my favorite time of night because it's still redownloading :(

I got kicked out from champ select as soon as the game was about to begin. It seemed no queue dodger was incurred, but it took a whole minute for the queue to start up again so I restarted the client ~~and now I can't log in~~.

I got in, but I can't queue up on time. Find Match is stuck whenever I select it, and it takes a whole minute for it to start finding as I mentioned above. What's up???
still not working...

> [{quoted}](name=RiotRival,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=FARHwWMK,comment-id=000e,timestamp=2017-05-11T07:19:18.957+0000)
>
> Hey all! 
> Sorry for not saying something earlier, but we were checking this out and believe we have a fix in place. You should be able to login  without issues. 
> How's it looking now?

I managed to log in just fine. Thanks for the quick fix!

Quite dodgy. Ping was at 25 ms regularly yesterday. Now after this issue, ping is hovering in the range of 80-100 ms in practice tool.

*well, it spiked down to 25 ms and is sticking, all is good :)
+1 on Frontier Fios if that helps at all. V7.9-4401018.4406640
i use the frontier too, not sure is the internet casue this problem or the patch .
+1 to Frontier too. Welp
Guess we figured out the problem :/ do we talk to Riot or Frontier?
Tried switching back to Frontier after I logged in, client is messed up again and having connection issues, but it's working.
so, how can we solve this problem, report to Riot ?

It could be some port / routing related issue between RIOT and Frontier.

Unfortunately I don't think there's anything you can do for now until they fix it other than use a different internet like your phone hotspot.
stupid  internet company, always dc during the game like 20 seconds, i tried contact them but they told me their internet has no problem at all.
so true that happens to me too.
Do you use wifi? If so you should try plugging in with an ethernet cable.
Good news. It's working for me now!

Update: I tried logging in from my phone's internet instead, it worked.

Seems like could be Frontier related indeed.
Also on Frontier. Login stuck on Authenticating.
also frontier. i reset the box did not help anything
Trying using your phone hotspot as WiFi for your PC to login temporarily, then switch back to your normal internet after you login

ISP is Frontier; Currently Authenticating for 30+ minutes :)))))))))))


**there was a recent storm in the area that knocked the power out where I live, BUT i can still post this using Frontier's connection.. seems unrelated.
bump
i have the same problem. I tried to use my phone's internet to log in first and then switch back.  But I was disconnected later....

If you're still having issues please take a look at my comment here!
> https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/m02U46pw-stuck-authenticating-5112017
Hopefully it can help you solve this!
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

I found a possible fix. My friend and I used the hextech repair tool found here.
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool
Upon completion we were able to log back into league and play :D

If you call Frontier and your internet is working they won't help you, 100%. Reset your TCP/IP and winsock, and if you still can't get in you are going to have to bug Riot. Riot is great at advocating on behalf of their playerbase and will talk to people above the drones you get on the phone.

Source: trust me I know more about Frontier than I'd ever have cared to.
(update) I'm able to login. Haven't tried playing yet, but I've managed a login.

I'm having the same problem on Frontier. I tried the hextech repair tool, it didn't find anything wrong. Riot Support had a statement up on  twitter saying that Dark Star Login had an issue and they're working on it. Hopefully it gets resolved quickly {{summoner:6}}

I was just able to login successfully. After 2 failed attempts where I received the red error message "an unknown error prevented...", I just tried logging in again and it worked. Queuing up for a game now, will see if I encounter any other connection issues.
i also have this problem
Same, tried everything I can to fix it but to no avail. Pretty sure it's on Riot's side though since their servers and such have been screwed up for like 5 days now.
same problem anyone found a solution?

yea same problem  did same thing as shadow restarted my com pit worked but  spectating was bugged couldn't see friends game couldn't join so I restarted lol  and I'm back where I started  restarted with the authenticating loop  restarted computer again  lol works fine to enter this time I try entering practice tool (still not able to spectate)  get into  tool mode  and game is laggy as hell
Can confirm this issue for myself as well. I appear to be stuck in an authentication loop.

I had the same issue, I ended up closing out and restarting my comp. Worked after that but then there was a 5s or so delay between every action in champ select. Once I was in game everything was normal, until I was making my way to post game where it was stuck on attempting to reconnect. Ended up closing out and now it won't even launch. Might try restarting my comp again but probably going to call it a night.
Me too but sometimes i cant even get the login part to even come up both accounts are having problems logging in
